name: Push-up
description: A fundamental bodyweight exercise where you lower your chest towards the ground and push back up.

name: Squat (Bodyweight)
description: A basic bodyweight exercise where you lower your hips as if sitting in a chair, keeping your back straight.

name: Plank
description: Hold a position similar to the top of a push-up, supporting your body on your forearms and toes.

name: Lunges (Bodyweight)
description: Step forward with one leg, lowering your hips until both knees are bent at approximately a 90-degree angle.

name: Crunches
description: Lie on your back, bend your knees, and lift your upper body towards your knees, engaging your abdominal muscles.

name: Glute Bridge
description: Lie on your back with bent knees, lift your hips off the ground until your body forms a straight line from shoulders to knees.

name: Wall Sit
description: Lean your back against a wall and slide down until your knees are at a 90-degree angle, holding the position.

name: Triceps Dip
description: Use a sturdy chair or bench, place hands behind you, and lower your body by bending elbows.

name: Triceps Dip (Chair)
description: Use a sturdy chair or bench, place hands behind you, and lower your body by bending elbows.

name: Calf Raises
description: Stand and raise yourself onto the balls of your feet, then slowly lower back down.

name: Calf Raises (Bodyweight)
description: Stand and raise yourself onto the balls of your feet, then slowly lower back down.

name: Bird Dog
description: Start on all fours, extend one arm forward and the opposite leg backward, maintaining a stable core.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: Start in a plank position and bring one knee towards your chest, then switch quickly.

name: Burpees
description: A full-body exercise combining a squat, push-up, and jump.

name: Jump Squats
description: Perform a squat and then explode upwards into a jump.

name: High Knees
description: Run in place, bringing your knees up towards your chest as high as possible.

name: Jumping Jacks
description: Jump while spreading your legs and raising your arms overhead, then return to the starting position.

name: Leg Raises
description: Lie on your back and lift your legs straight up towards the ceiling, then slowly lower them.

name: Russian Twists
description: Sit on the floor with bent knees, lean back slightly, and twist your torso from side to side.

name: Superman
description: Lie face down, lift your arms and legs off the ground simultaneously, engaging your back muscles.

name: Reverse Crunches
description: Lie on your back, lift your knees towards your chest, and then lift your hips off the ground.

name: Pike Push-ups
description: Start in a pike position with hips elevated, then lower your head towards the ground by bending elbows.

name: Wall Handstand Hold
description: Kick up into a handstand against a wall and hold the position.

name: Side Plank
description: Support your body on one forearm and the side of your foot, keeping your body in a straight line.

name: Pull-up
description: Use a chair or lower bar to assist in pulling your body up.

name: Assisted Pull-up (Chair/Low Bar)
description: Use a chair or lower bar to assist in pulling your body up.

name: Incline Push-up
description: Perform a push-up with your hands elevated on a stable surface (e.g., table, bench).

name: Decline Push-up
description: Perform a push-up with your feet elevated on a stable surface (e.g., chair, bench).

name: Pistol Squat
description: Perform a single-leg squat while holding onto a support for balance.

name: Handstand Push-up (Assisted)
description: Perform a handstand push-up with support from a wall or spotting.

name: One-Arm Plank
description: Hold a plank position while lifting one arm off the ground.

name: L-Sit (Tuck)
description: Sit on the floor and lift your body off the ground with bent knees, supported by your hands.

name: Australian Pull-up (Bodyweight Row)
description: Lie under a low bar or sturdy table, grasp the bar, and pull your chest towards it.

name: Hindu Push-up
description: A dynamic push-up where you move from a downward dog to an upward dog position.

name: Single Leg Deadlift (Bodyweight)
description: Balance on one leg and hinge at the hips, extending the other leg straight back.

name: Box Jumps (Low Box/Stairs)
description: Jump onto a low box or sturdy step, landing softly, then step or jump back down.

name: Hollow Body Hold
description: Lie on your back, lift your arms and legs slightly off the ground, forming a 'hollow' shape with your body.

name: Arch Hold
description: Lie face down, lift your chest and legs off the ground, arching your back.

name: Wall Push-up
description: Perform a push-up against a wall, standing upright.

name: Chair Squat
description: Squat down until your glutes touch a chair, then stand back up.

name: Step-ups (Stairs)
description: Step onto a sturdy stair or elevated surface, then step back down.

name: Good Mornings
description: Stand with a slight bend in knees, hinge at hips, keeping back straight, and lower torso towards parallel.

name: Good Mornings (Bodyweight)
description: Stand with a slight bend in knees, hinge at hips, keeping back straight, and lower torso towards parallel.

name: Knee Push-ups
description: Perform a push-up with your knees on the ground for assistance.

name: Diamond Push-ups
description: Perform a push-up with your hands close together, forming a diamond shape.

name: Wide Push-ups
description: Perform a push-up with your hands wider than shoulder-width apart.

name: One-Legged Glute Bridge
description: Perform a glute bridge with one leg extended, focusing on one side.

name: Flutter Kicks
description: Lie on your back, lift your legs slightly, and rapidly move them up and down in a kicking motion.

name: Bicycle Crunches
description: Lie on your back, bring opposite elbow to opposite knee while extending the other leg.

name: Cobra Stretch
description: Lie face down, place hands under shoulders, and gently push up your chest, keeping hips on the floor.

name: Cat-Cow Stretch
description: On all fours, arch your back like a cat, then round it like a cow, coordinating with breath.

name: Child's Pose
description: Rest on your knees, fold forward with arms extended, resting your forehead on the floor.

name: Barbell Bench Press
description: Lie on a flat bench, grab a barbell, and lower it to your chest before pressing it back up.

name: Incline Barbell Bench Press
description: Lie on an incline bench with a barbell, and press the weight up and down. This variation targets the upper chest.

name: Decline Barbell Bench Press
description: Lie on a decline bench with a barbell, and press the weight up and down. This variation targets the lower chest.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
description: Lie on a flat bench with a dumbbell in each hand. Press the dumbbells up from your chest until your arms are fully extended.

name: Dumbbell Fly
description: Lie on a flat bench with dumbbells in each hand, arms extended, and lower them out to the side in an arc, then bring them back together over your chest.

name: Cable Flyes
description: Stand between two high pulleys, hold a handle in each hand, and bring your hands together in an arc in front of your chest.

name: Pec Deck
description: Sit on the pec deck machine, grasp the handles, and bring them together in front of your chest, squeezing your pectoral muscles.

name: Dumbbell Pullover
description: Lie on a bench holding a dumbbell with both hands over your chest. Lower the dumbbell in an arc over your head, then return to the starting position.

name: Deadlift
description: Lift a loaded barbell from the floor to a standing position, keeping your back straight.

name: T-Bar Row
description: Stand on a T-bar row machine or with a barbell in a landmine attachment. Hinge at your hips and pull the weight towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.

name: Bent-Over Dumbbell Rows
description: Bend at the waist with a straight back, hold dumbbells, and row them up towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.

name: Seated Cable Row
description: Sit on a cable machine with a V-grip handle. Pull the handle towards your torso, keeping your back straight and squeezing your shoulder blades together.

name: Dumbbell Bent-Over Row
description: Hinge at your hips and pull a dumbbell towards your chest. You can perform this with one arm at a time for more stability.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: Sit at a lat pulldown machine, grab the bar, and pull it down to your chest by engaging your back muscles.

name: Hyperextensions
description: Lie face down on a hyperextension bench, anchor your feet, and lower your torso down and up, keeping your back straight.

name: Overhead Press (Barbell)
description: Press a barbell from your shoulders directly overhead until your arms are fully extended.

name: Dumbbell Lateral Raises
description: Hold a dumbbell in each hand and raise your arms out to the sides until they are parallel to the floor.

name: Face Pulls
description: Using a cable machine, pull a rope attachment towards your face, externally rotating your shoulders.

name: Front Raises
description: Hold dumbbells and raise your arms straight out in front of you to shoulder height.

name: Handstand Push-ups
description: Kick up into a handstand and perform a push-up while inverted. Can be done against a wall for support.

name: Barbell Squats
description: Place a barbell across your back and squat down, keeping your back straight and chest up.

name: Leg Press
description: Sit on a leg press machine and push the platform away from your body with your feet.

name: Lunges (Dumbbell)
description: Hold dumbbells at your sides, step forward with one leg, and lower your hips until both knees are bent at 90 degrees.

name: Calf Raises (Machine)
description: Use a calf raise machine to raise yourself onto the balls of your feet, then lower back down.

name: Romanian Deadlift (RDL)
description: Hold a barbell or dumbbells and hinge at your hips, lowering the weight while keeping your legs mostly straight.

name: Barbell Bicep Curl
description: Stand upright with a barbell, keeping elbows tucked in, and curl the barbell upwards towards your shoulders.

name: Dumbbell Hammer Curls
description: Hold dumbbells with a neutral grip (palms facing each other) and curl them up towards your shoulders.

name: Preacher Curls
description: Using a preacher curl bench, rest your upper arms on the pad and curl a barbell or dumbbells.

name: Chin-ups
description: Hang from a pull-up bar with an underhand grip and pull your body up until your chin is above the bar.

name: Concentration Curls
description: Sit on a bench, rest your elbow against your thigh, and curl a dumbbell with a focused motion.

name: Skull Crushers
description: Lie on a bench, hold an EZ bar or dumbbells over your chest, and lower them towards your head by bending your elbows.

name: Rope Overhead Triceps Extension
description: Using a cable machine with a rope attachment, stand or kneel facing away from the machine. Extend your arms overhead, keeping your elbows fixed, to contract the triceps.

name: Dumbbell Kickback
description: Hinge at your hips, keeping your back straight. Hold a dumbbell in one hand and extend your elbow to move the dumbbell straight back, squeezing your triceps.

name: Cable Triceps Pushdown
description: Stand in front of a cable machine, push a rope or bar attachment down by extending your elbows.

name: Close-Grip Bench Press
description: Lie on a flat bench and press a barbell with your hands closer than shoulder-width apart.

name: Reverse Pec Deck
description: Sit facing the pec deck machine with your chest against the pad. Grip the handles and pull them back, squeezing your rear deltoids.

name: Overhead Dumbbell Triceps Extension
description: Sit on a bench and hold a dumbbell with both hands, extending it overhead and lowering it behind your head.

name: Plank
description: Hold a position similar to the top of a push-up, supporting your body on your forearms and toes.

name: Russian Twists
description: Sit on the floor with bent knees, lean back slightly, and twist your torso from side to side.

name: Hanging Leg Raises
description: Hang from a bar and raise your legs up towards your chest or past parallel.

name: Cable Crunches
description: Kneel in front of a high pulley cable and crunch your torso down towards the floor.

name: Bicycle Crunches
description: Lie on your back, bring opposite elbow to opposite knee while extending the other leg.

name: Burpees
description: A full-body exercise combining a squat, push-up, and jump.

name: Kettlebell Swings
description: Use a kettlebell, hinge at your hips, and swing the weight between your legs and then up to shoulder height.

name: Box Jumps
description: Jump onto a sturdy box or elevated surface, landing softly, and then step back down.

name: Clean and Jerk
description: A two-part Olympic lift involving lifting a barbell from the floor to the shoulders (clean) and then overhead (jerk).

name: Sled Push
description: Push a weighted sled across the floor, driving with your legs and upper body.
